page.title: 15Changes in farming & fishing
page.content: There have been many changes in various aspects of life in Clovelly within the span of a lifetime notably in{agriculture.} A change from :- handmilking to machine milking; churns to bulk tanker collection; hedge trimming with hook to machine; horse to tractor; haymaking by hand to baling by machine; hand shearing of sheep to electrical clippers and from hand reaping to combine harvesting. Today agriculture is an industry with more mechanisation and fewer employees. There are also fewer hedges. In{fishing}there has also been change. There is not so much fishing done now with a special decline in herring fishing after the E.E.C. ban.
